trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission" /> 执行安全操作。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the security declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许的安全声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute> works with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission> to allow or deny actions by the peer granted the permission and the permission attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermissionAttribute> 适用于<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission>以允许或拒绝对等方操作授予的权限和权限属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not used, and is included only to support inheritance from <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute" /> at compile time or during interpretation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法未使用，并且包含只是为了支持从继承<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute" />在编译时或在解释。

trans-unit.source: When this class inherits from <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute" />, it overrides <see cref="M:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute.CreatePermission" /> automatically at compile time or at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 此类继承自<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute" />，它将重写<see cref="M:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAttribute.CreatePermission" />自动在编译时或在运行时。
